ch0130_00_serena/0101_0701_01_10:
Hi there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I had a feeling you’d show up today!
ch0130_00_serena/0101_0701_02_10:
You’d better keep yourself in tip-top shape,
because I’ll be coming for another battle with
you soon!
ch0130_00_serena/0601_0701_01_10:
Dressing fashionably is tricky, you know. The
clothes you love aren’t always the ones that suit
you best.
ch0130_00_serena/0601_0701_02_10:
But I try to make sure my tastes show through, no
matter what I wear!
ch0130_00_serena/0601_0701_03_10:
I guess in that regard, it’s not so different from
picking your strategy in a Pokémon battle. Maybe
that’s where my love for fashion comes from!
ch0130_00_serena/0601_0702_01_10:
Is there anything you’re really particular about
when it comes to fashion?
ch0130_00_serena/0601_0702_02_10:
If so, tell me all about it! I love picking up tips
and details from people’s styles!
ch0130_00_serena/0602_0701_01_10:
Everyone has their own good points. That’s true of
people and Pokémon alike!
ch0130_00_serena/0602_0701_02_10:
It’s useful to pinpoint what makes other sync pairs
strong and try to learn from them.
ch0130_00_serena/0602_0701_03_10:
But of course, I’m different from others, so it’s
just as important to improve what makes ME
good, too!
ch0130_00_serena/0602_0702_01_10: I’ve definitely noticed what your good points are!
ch0130_00_serena/0602_0702_02_10:
And I’m not the only one, either. I’ll bet you
anything your teammates and your partner
Pokémon have noticed, too.
ch0130_00_serena/0602_0702_03_10:
In fact, I suspect it’s exactly those qualities that
make them want to stick with you.
ch0130_00_serena/0603_0701_01_10:
My house is right next door to Calem’s. We like to
call each other “neighbor.”
ch0130_00_serena/0603_0701_02_10:
We’re good friends, not to mention good rivals!
We battled each other over and over during our
journey in Kalos.
ch0130_00_serena/0603_0701_03_10:
I grew a lot as a Trainer on that adventure, and a
lot of that growth was probably thanks to him.
ch0130_00_serena/0603_0701_04_10:
Sure, he can get a bit too serious now and then.
But that can also be a good quality of his.
ch0130_00_serena/0603_0702_01_10:
Our journey was really trying. But we made it
through thanks to our friends.
ch0130_00_serena/0603_0702_02_10:
And having you here on Pasio has made this such
a fun adventure, too!
ch0130_00_serena/0603_0702_03_10:
What do you say we keep on growing together?
As friends and as rivals, of course!
ch0130_00_serena/0604_0701_01_10:
A Trainer I’ve wanted to meet forever is here
on Pasio!
ch0130_00_serena/0604_0701_02_10:
It’s Elesa, Unova’s biggest fashion icon! She’s both
a model and a Gym Leader!
ch0130_00_serena/0604_0701_03_10:
She’s incredible! She takes these outfits that are
so big and bold, yet so delicate and subtle, and
wears them stunningly!
ch0130_00_serena/0604_0701_04_10:
She’s what every kid with a taste for fashion
wants to be when they grow up!
ch0130_00_serena/0604_0702_01_10:
Isn’t it wonderful how you can just stroll through
Pasio and see styles from different regions?
Not to mention Trainers in sygna suits?
ch0130_00_serena/0604_0702_02_10: It’s a paradise for Trainers and fashionistas!
ch0130_00_serena/0605_0701_01_10:
Kalos has a good number of boutiques across
its towns and cities.
ch0130_00_serena/0605_0701_02_10:
During my travels, one of my personal objectives
was to go on a little fashion tour of the shops
around the region.
ch0130_00_serena/0605_0701_03_10:
Hey, I just had an idea! Why don’t you and I go
shopping together sometime soon,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0130_00_serena/0605_0701_04_10:
It’ll be great! We can pick out clothes for each
other and see how they look...
ch0130_00_serena/0605_0701_05_10:
and then take our new threads out for a stroll
through town! Doesn’t that sound like fun? Hehe!
ch0130_00_serena/0605_0702_01_10:
It’s so exciting to learn about other people’s
tastes and preferences.
ch0130_00_serena/0605_0702_02_10:
Sometimes you get to hear or see ideas you never
would’ve come up with yourself!
ch0130_00_serena/1701_0701_01_10: I’ve got something nice to give you!
ch0130_00_serena/1701_0701_02_10:
Here you go! I have a feeling it’ll come in handy
when you’re out exploring!
ch0130_00_serena/1701_0702_01_10: So, was that a handy present or what?
ch0130_00_serena/1701_0702_02_10:
If I find any other neat stuff, I’ll make sure to
share it with you!
ch0130_00_serena/2501_0701_01_10:
You know, I didn’t really realize it until I spent
some time with you, but there’s something about
you I find incredible.
ch0130_00_serena/2501_0701_02_10:
You’ve got these team members from all over the
world, with their different ideas and battle styles...
ch0130_00_serena/2501_0701_03_10:
but put you in the picture with them, and it’s like
they shine! They’re all being their best selves and
looking so happy!
ch0130_00_serena/2501_0701_04_10: That’s a rare, precious talent you’ve got.
ch0130_00_serena/2501_0702_01_10:
Hehe, judging by your reaction, this is all news to
you, huh?
ch0130_00_serena/2501_0702_02_10:
Well, it’s true—you’re something special. You can
take my word for it.
ch0130_00_serena/2501_0702_03_10:
I dream of creating a world where we don’t have
to settle for anything less—a world that brings a
smile to everybody’s faces...
ch0130_00_serena/2501_0702_04_10:
When I look at you, I feel like that dream might be
within reach after all!
ch0130_00_serena/2511_0701_01_10:
During my travels, I met a man who claimed that
the world had become ugly and would be razed
by conflict.
ch0130_00_serena/2511_0701_02_10: But I believe there’s more to the world than that.
ch0130_00_serena/2511_0701_03_10:
We’re all capable of connecting with one
another—forging bonds and sharing joy and
hardship alike.
ch0130_00_serena/2511_0701_04_10:
Seeing the way you and your teammates get
along has only reinforced that belief for me!
ch0130_00_serena/2511_0702_01_10:
I’m looking forward to sticking with you and
seeing what different types of situations bring out
in you!
ch0130_00_serena/2511_0702_02_10:
If we work together, I really think we can make
a difference, no matter when or where!
ch0130_00_serena/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Make sure you give it your all today.
Battling tough Trainers is the best way to
get stronger!
ch0130_00_serena/3002_0701_01_10:
I like to take my time getting ready in the
morning. I’ve gotta make sure I look my best!
ch0130_00_serena/3003_0701_01_10:
Every day feels new and exciting on Pasio, huh!
It reminds me of when I first set out on my
journey in Kalos.
ch0130_00_serena/3004_0701_01_10:
Hey, how’s it going? Have you worn that outfit
before? I’m loving this style on you!
ch0130_00_serena/3005_0701_01_10:
Everybody makes mistakes. The important thing
is to own up to them, even if that can be
tough sometimes.
ch0130_00_serena/3006_0701_01_10:
Training and studying are important, but I try not
to stay up too late. I need to get my beauty sleep,
after all!
